00002  * config.cpp

00005 #include <string.h>
00006 #include <stdio.h>
00007 #include <iostream>
00008 #include "utility.h"
00009 #include "config.h"
00010 
00011 using namespace std;
00012 
00013 config::config() {
00014         Assert(false && "This constructor is unsupported - config()");
00015 }
00016 
00017 // PRE:
00018 //              cfgFile to exist
00019 //              PinPointFile to exist
00020 config::config(char* cfg_file) {
00021         char pinPoint_s_file[PARSE_LEN], pinPoint_w_file[PARSE_LEN], param[PARSE_LEN];
00022         FILE* f_config = fopen (cfg_file,"r");
00023         #ifdef ASSERTION
00024         Assert(f_config != NULL);
00025         #endif
00026         int t_use_simpoint = -1;
00027         fscanf(f_config, "%s = %d\n", param, &t_use_simpoint);
00028         _use_simpoint = (bool)t_use_simpoint;
00029         #ifdef ASSERTION
00030         Assert(strcmp(param,"USE_SIMPOINT")==0 && "Wrong Parameter parsed.");
00031         #endif
00032         fscanf(f_config, "%s = \" %s \"", param, pinPoint_s_file);
00033         #ifdef ASSERTION
00034         Assert(strcmp(param,"PINPOINT_SIM_FILE")==0 && "Wrong Parameter parsed.");
00035         #endif
00036         fscanf(f_config, "%s = \" %s \"", param, pinPoint_w_file);
00037         #ifdef ASSERTION
00038         Assert(strcmp(param,"PINPOINT_WEIGHT_FILE")==0 && "Wrong Parameter parsed.");
00039         #endif
00040         Assert(parsePinPointFiles(pinPoint_s_file, pinPoint_w_file) == true && "No simpoint data parsed.");
00041 }
00042 
00043 // PRE:
00044 //              pinPoint_file to exist
00045 bool config::parsePinPointFiles(char* pinPoint_s_file, char* pinPoint_w_file) {
00046         //TODO check if the file exists - assert if not
00047         FILE* f_s_pinPoint = fopen(pinPoint_s_file, "r");
00048         FILE* f_w_pinPoint = fopen(pinPoint_w_file, "r");
00049         #ifdef ASSERTION
00050         Assert(f_s_pinPoint != NULL);
00051         Assert(f_w_pinPoint != NULL);
00052         #endif
00053         int s_id, w_id;
00054         SIMP s_val; 
00055         SIMW w_val;
00056         while (fscanf(f_s_pinPoint,"%lu %d\n", &s_val, &s_id) != EOF && 
00057                    fscanf(f_w_pinPoint,"%lf %d\n", &w_val, &w_id) != EOF) {
00058                 #ifdef ASSERTION
00059                 Assert(s_id == w_id && "simpoint and weight files mispatch.");
00060                 #endif
00061                 s_val = s_val * SIMP_WINDOW_SIZE;
00062                 _simpoint.insert(std::pair<SIMP,SIMW>(s_val,w_val));
00063         }
00064         //#ifdef DBG
00065         cout << "-------------------\n";
00066         cout << "PinPoint locations:\n";
00067         map<SIMP,SIMW>::iterator it;
00068         for (it = _simpoint.begin(); it != _simpoint.end(); it++) {
00069                 cout << it->first << " " << it->second << endl;
00070         }
00071         cout << "-------------------\n";
00072         //#endif
00073         return ((_simpoint.size() > 0) ? true : false);
00074 }
